name: M∀LICE Pawn Cheshire Cat
desc: Any monster destroyed by battle with a "M∀LICE" Link Monster that points to this card is banished. You can only use each of the following effects of "M∀LICE Cheshire Cat" once per turn. During your Main Phase: You can banish 1 "M∀LICE" card from your hand, then you can draw 2 cards. If this card is banished: You can pay 300 LP; Special Summon this card, also you cannot Special Summon from the Extra Deck for the rest of this turn, except Link Monsters.
